attributes.action: Hold a general election following the conservative leadership campaign.
attributes.additional_details: I have taken a voting populace of 46.8 million from the electoralcommission.org website and a voter turnout of 140000 for the conservative leadership contest.
attributes.background: We cannot allow a vote by 0.3% of the electorate decide whether to leave the EU without a deal. We must call a general election to ensure that a government with a sufficient mandate is elected to make these changes to our lives and those of the rest of Europe and the World.
